软件包 com.xhSmart.service

接口摘要
AllocationService 负责Allocation表的增删改查
DemandService 负责Demand表的增删改查
DepartmentService 负责Department表的增删改查
FeedbackService 负责Feedback表的增删改查
JurisdictionGroupService 已过时。  
JurisdictionService 已过时。  
PostService 负责Post表的增删改查
ProductService 负责Product表的增删改查
ProjectService 负责Project表的增删改查
UserService 负责User表的增删改查
UserTaskService 负责Task表的增删改查
